name: preTask1
label: Select a media type from the menu below and use it to create an introduction giving a sense of the activity’s context.

name: preTask2
label: Teach people important words used in the activity. You can do this with a ‘presentation’ or an ‘image’ with text and audio.

name: mainTask
label: Create instructions demonstrating how to do the activity. Choose ‘Interactive Video’ if you have one video for the whole activity, or ‘Course Presentation’ for visual instructions and short video clips.

name: postTask
label: Test how much users learned about your activity. ‘Image Sequencing’ is a good choice if you want to test how much users learned about the process. ‘Image Pairing’ can help you test users' knowledge of the vocabulary. ‘Single choice set’ can be used to make a standard text-based quiz.
